abstract: With concerns growing over Citigroup‘s exposure to subprime mortgage-related securities, the firm said Tuesday that it had appointed Richard Stuckey as its point person to manage the business. Mr. Stuckey is no newcomer to helping Citi out of a jam: In 1998, he helped pull the bank out of Long-Term Capital Management.
